messages.subject: Nanci and Amy was Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Changing friends b/c of  homeschooling
messages.msgSnippet: ... Amy, What brand of soy butter? I ve only been able to find one brand and it tastes like um, well crap. I can t have peanut butter because of kidney stone
messages.messageBody:
Amy wrote:
>
> you might want to try soy "nut" butter. It's 100% nut free, but tastes just
> like peanut butter. I have 2 w/peanut allergies (1 life threatening) and
> they do fine w/it. You can find it at Trader Joes and other supermarkets.
> Amy

Amy,
What brand of soy butter?
I've only been able to find one brand and it tastes like um, well crap.
I can't have peanut butter because of kidney stone problems so I've been
using almond and cashew.

Nanci ... Cashew and almond....
Would those be ok Nanci? or is it an allergy that includes all nuts?

Buzz
